compliant.legal provisions: Right of access by the data subject

compliant.section: Right to request deletion of personal information
compliant.legal provisions: Right to erasure ("right to be forgotten")

compliant.section: Right to opt-out of the sale of personal information
compliant.legal provisions: Right to object - grounds relating to the particular situation of the data subject - right to object to processing including profiling

compliant.section: Right not to be discriminated against for exercising CCPA rights
compliant.legal provisions: Right to object - grounds relating to the particular situation of the data subject - right to object to processing including profiling

non_compliant.section: Introduction - This section only applies to California residents and mentions CCPA specifically.
non_compliant.legal provisions: The GDPR applies to all EU residents, not just those in a particular region.  The entire policy should be amended to be in compliance with the GDPR if the organization is subject to the GDPR.
non_compliant.amend: The entire policy should be reviewed and amended to ensure it applies to all data subjects covered by the GDPR, not just those residing in California.  The language should be modified to be general and not specific to a particular law like CCPA.
